step_data.thought: The previous actions have successfully checked and enabled the checkbox for 'Enable Category' for all store views and confirmed the save changes. The next step is to send a message to the user confirming that the category with ID 2 has been enabled for all store views.
step_data.action: stop('The category with ID 2 has been successfully enabled for all store views.')
